data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Mae Hong Son, Thailand.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mae Hong Son, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Please, teach the 1,861 believers in Mae Hong Son, Thailand how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 154 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 284,039 lost people in  Mae Hong Son, Thailand have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 1,861 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Tai Man, Shan people.
Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Mae Hong Son, Thailand.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Mae Hong Son, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mae Hong Son, Thailand has a population of 287,800.

We estimate Mae Hong Son has 1,861 people who might know Jesus, 1,900 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 284,039 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 98.69 percent of the people of Mae Hong Son are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
